nodes.text: Ammonia (NH3) was a gas which some beings, such as Arcona and the breathing Gand subspecies, needed to breathe in order to survive. Cona's atmosphere contained high levels of ammonia, which could be crystallized into solid dactyl. Ammonia-breathing Gand bounty hunter Zuckuss was known for using ammonia bombs that were toxic to most oxygen-breathers.
On board the Lido Deck of the Galaxy Tours cruiseliner, the Kuari Princess, there existed for passengers competition-sized swimming tanks that contained ammonia and mercury.
Ammonia snowflakes were the primary make up of the highest clouds in Yavin's atmosphere.
